issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://com.plexapp.android](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fcom.plexapp.android) ### Comment > At first, I thought this was a DNS issue, but I disabled DNS and tried again but had the same issue. > > I tried to turn off Adguard completely and to my surprise, the Plex Android app worked instantly. > > I have tried keeping Adguard enabled and disabling all filters but unfortunately, the Plex app does not work. I have to completely disable Adguard to get it to work. > > Or If I disable Route traffic through Adguard for Plex it also works. > > So it's something in Adguard core that is blocking the Plex app from loading. I have checked logs for Plex in Adguard, I don't see anything blocked. Username: `@XBadFellaX` ### Screenshots

issue.title: timesofindia.indiatimes.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180744) if other issue.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://netportal.hdfcbank.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fnetportal.hdfcbank.com) ### Comment > Hi, > > Adguard Chrome browser extension: Version 4.3.53 > TSWebExtension v1.0.24 > TSUrlFilter v2.2.18 > Scriptlets v1.10.25 > ExtendedCss v2.0.56 > > OS: Windows 11 Pro 23H2 22631.3737 x64 > > Problem since: last 1 months > > Issue Details: > Every time I try to log into my HDFC net banking portal (netportal.hdfcbank.com) after logging in the portal says the following > > "You've Been Logged Out > > For security reasons, we have logged you out of HDFC Bank NetBanking. We do this when you refresh/move back on the browser on any NetBanking page." > > I turned off all the browser extensions & enabled them one by one to find out which one was causing this issue, it turns out that the Adguard Chrome browser extension is the one. > > Currently, as a workaround, I've added netportal.hdfcbank.com to the allowlist so that in this particular domain adguard remains inactive. > > I reported this on Github: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/2845 > > & to adguard email team [supportadguard.com] with the same details plus the screen captured video of this issue for better understanding & clarification > > ticket ID 916920 was assigned & the email team advised me to contact here, so reporting the same here too. > > Pls, fix this ASAP Username: `@SM-03 ` ### Screenshots

There's nothing more you need to do on your end, I've already added an exception to the filters (the Base filter should be enabled), and the update will be available soon. Thank you for your participation.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://netportal.hdfcbank.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fnetportal.hdfcbank.com) ### Comment > Hi, > > Adguard Chrome browser extension: Version 4.3.53 > TSWebExtension v1.0.24 > TSUrlFilter v2.2.18 > Scriptlets v1.10.25 > ExtendedCss v2.0.56 > > OS: Windows 11 Pro 23H2 22631.3737 x64 > > Problem since: last 1 months > > Issue Details: > Every time I try to log into my HDFC net banking portal (netportal.hdfcbank.com) after logging in the portal says the following > > "You've Been Logged Out > > For security reasons, we have logged you out of HDFC Bank NetBanking. We do this when you refresh/move back on the browser on any NetBanking page." > > I turned off all the browser extensions & enabled them one by one to find out which one was causing this issue, it turns out that the Adguard Chrome browser extension is the one. > > Currently, as a workaround, I've added netportal.hdfcbank.com to the allowlist so that in this particular domain adguard remains inactive. > > I reported this on Github: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/2845 > > & to adguard email team [supportadguard.com] with the same details plus the screen captured video of this issue for better understanding & clarification > > ticket ID 916920 was assigned & the email team advised me to contact here, so reporting the same here too. > > Pls, fix this ASAP Username: `@SM-03 ` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
> Should I (we, as general users) enable this after the filters get updated? Or keep it disabled?

If you don't have the exception in user rules, it's better to disable that option until you get the new filter update.

comment.body:
Teoretycznie jedna z reguł, która jest w filtrach powinna nadal działać.
@FadeMind Mógłbyś proszę sprawdzić, czy po dodaniu tych reguł:
```adblock
kurnik.pl#@%#//scriptlet("abort-on-property-read", "abask")
kurnik.pl#%#//scriptlet('abort-on-property-write', 'abask')
kurnik.pl#$#body ins.adsbygoogle[data-ad-slot] { display: block !important; height: 2px !important; width: 1px !important; }
```
problem nadal występuje?

@zloyden
Thanks for confirming.

did you mean Adguard for Chrome extension version update? or it be added within the filter update?

If I've to take a guess then it'd be at least 'once in a day'? let me know.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://netportal.hdfcbank.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fnetportal.hdfcbank.com) ### Comment > Hi, > > Adguard Chrome browser extension: Version 4.3.53 > TSWebExtension v1.0.24 > TSUrlFilter v2.2.18 > Scriptlets v1.10.25 > ExtendedCss v2.0.56 > > OS: Windows 11 Pro 23H2 22631.3737 x64 > > Problem since: last 1 months > > Issue Details: > Every time I try to log into my HDFC net banking portal (netportal.hdfcbank.com) after logging in the portal says the following > > "You've Been Logged Out > > For security reasons, we have logged you out of HDFC Bank NetBanking. We do this when you refresh/move back on the browser on any NetBanking page." > > I turned off all the browser extensions & enabled them one by one to find out which one was causing this issue, it turns out that the Adguard Chrome browser extension is the one. > > Currently, as a workaround, I've added netportal.hdfcbank.com to the allowlist so that in this particular domain adguard remains inactive. > > I reported this on Github: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/2845 > > & to adguard email team [supportadguard.com] with the same details plus the screen captured video of this issue for better understanding & clarification > > ticket ID 916920 was assigned & the email team advised me to contact here, so reporting the same here too. > > Pls, fix this ASAP Username: `@SM-03 ` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Got it, but don't have the account. Is it related to filters or stealth mode?
First, please check only with the filters above. If you have a problem with them, try to disable the filters one by one to find a problematic one.
```
AdGuard Base
AdGuard Tracking Protection
AdGuard Annoyances
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese
```
In case everything is fine with our filters, please disable them and check the site with stealth mode. If it breaks the site, try to disable the options to find a problematic one.

issue.title: etoland.co.kr

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

labels.name: List-KR
labels.description: Problematic issues, handled in List-KR

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);

- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.3.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://polsatboxgo.pl

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

Hi.
Probably your system or browser is infected by [adware](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/adware)
Please scan your system using [AdwCleaner](https://www.malwarebytes.com/adwcleaner/)

But if you share to us a HAR file or show source (initial script) of the ad, we can block it.

comment.body:
Не повторяется. Какой сертификат показывает браузер? Посмотреть можно в адресной строке, кликнув на значок слева (две полоски) - Подключение защищено.
Также проверить работу программы можно [здесь](https://adguard.com/test.html) как сказано [ранее](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/182151#issuecomment-2186521954).

issue.title: e.mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: www.dogdrip.net

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://netportal.hdfcbank.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fnetportal.hdfcbank.com) ### Comment > Hi, > > Adguard Chrome browser extension: Version 4.3.53 > TSWebExtension v1.0.24 > TSUrlFilter v2.2.18 > Scriptlets v1.10.25 > ExtendedCss v2.0.56 > > OS: Windows 11 Pro 23H2 22631.3737 x64 > > Problem since: last 1 months > > Issue Details: > Every time I try to log into my HDFC net banking portal (netportal.hdfcbank.com) after logging in the portal says the following > > "You've Been Logged Out > > For security reasons, we have logged you out of HDFC Bank NetBanking. We do this when you refresh/move back on the browser on any NetBanking page." > > I turned off all the browser extensions & enabled them one by one to find out which one was causing this issue, it turns out that the Adguard Chrome browser extension is the one. > > Currently, as a workaround, I've added netportal.hdfcbank.com to the allowlist so that in this particular domain adguard remains inactive. > > I reported this on Github: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/2845 > > & to adguard email team [supportadguard.com] with the same details plus the screen captured video of this issue for better understanding & clarification > > ticket ID 916920 was assigned & the email team advised me to contact here, so reporting the same here too. > > Pls, fix this ASAP Username: `@SM-03 ` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/5j79d99hr5gccws0480o8ckw0sgcs0kb9w7lmwxf20.png?nc=1)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://brendamizedolls.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fbrendamizedolls.com)
### Comment
> I am unable to disable Adguard DNS, or else I'd have no DNS servers for my network.  The website brendamizedolls.com, newly registered a week or two ago, is being blocked as malicious or phishing.  It's a basic Squarespace site selling handmade dolls.
Username: `@burbel`

### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://netportal.hdfcbank.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fnetportal.hdfcbank.com) ### Comment > Hi, > > Adguard Chrome browser extension: Version 4.3.53 > TSWebExtension v1.0.24 > TSUrlFilter v2.2.18 > Scriptlets v1.10.25 > ExtendedCss v2.0.56 > > OS: Windows 11 Pro 23H2 22631.3737 x64 > > Problem since: last 1 months > > Issue Details: > Every time I try to log into my HDFC net banking portal (netportal.hdfcbank.com) after logging in the portal says the following > > "You've Been Logged Out > > For security reasons, we have logged you out of HDFC Bank NetBanking. We do this when you refresh/move back on the browser on any NetBanking page." > > I turned off all the browser extensions & enabled them one by one to find out which one was causing this issue, it turns out that the Adguard Chrome browser extension is the one. > > Currently, as a workaround, I've added netportal.hdfcbank.com to the allowlist so that in this particular domain adguard remains inactive. > > I reported this on Github: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/2845 > > & to adguard email team [supportadguard.com] with the same details plus the screen captured video of this issue for better understanding & clarification > > ticket ID 916920 was assigned & the email team advised me to contact here, so reporting the same here too. > > Pls, fix this ASAP Username: `@SM-03 ` ### Screenshots
